= User commands =

  * .help and .?
  * .stats
  * .stop
  * .uptime
  * .version
_Optional User commands not available on all conferences_
  * .delurk
  * .list
  * .lurk
  * .play <bulletin #>
  * .test

= Sysop Commands =

  * .admins
  * .belchfilter <time constant>
  * .busy `[`on | off | status]
  * .connect <station> .disconnect <station>  
  * .delurk <callsign>
  * .disconnect ALL
  * .lurk `[`<callsign> | disable | lurk enable]
  * .message `[`message text]
  * .monitor `[`disable] <callsign>
  * .mute  `[. | <callsign> ... | -r | -c | -u | -s | -t | -a | -e] [tbd cmd mute]
  * .pausetime  .pausetime <time constant>
  * .play4 `[`-f] `[`-i] <filename> `[`displayed name]
  * .sysop <password>
  * .unmute `[` <callsign> ... | -r | -c | -u | -s | -t | -a | -e] [tbd cmd mute]
  * .users

= Administrator Commands =
  
  * .admin <password>
  * .allow add <callsign>
  * .allow delete <callsign>  
  * .allow list
  * .ban add <callsign> `[`IP Address/HostName]
  * .ban delete <callsign>
  * .ban list
  * .dns list
  * .dns refresh
  * .info `[`Info field text]
  * .kick <callsign>
  * .list add <filename> <description>
  * .quit
  * .quote <command line>
  * .record `[`<filename> | stop]
  * .refresh
  * .rehash
  * .showip
  * .shutdown

= Scripting Commands =

  * .chat `[`on | off]
